snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''California Makes College an Entitlement'' (Op-Ed, Sept. 26): Perhaps Abigail Thernstrom is correct in asserting that the main beneficiaries of California's new education entitlement are likely to be middle-class students....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''California Makes College an Entitlement'' (Op-Ed, Sept. 26): Perhaps Abigail Thernstrom is correct in asserting that the main beneficiaries of California's new education entitlement are likely to be middle-class students.
abstract: Anthony Q Fletcher letter says California's new education entitlement benefits all in state by encouraging best students to stay in school (S)
